summary: The clues to a young woman's death come together as the lives of seemingly unrelated people begin to intersect.
cast: Toni Collette|Piper Laurie|Donnie Smith|Michael Raysses|Earl Carroll|Dorothy Beatty|Eva Loseth|Giovanni Ribisi|Rose Byrne|Joanie Tomsky|James Franco|Christopher Allen Nelson|Mary Steenburgen|Bruce Davison|Kate Mulligan|Mary Beth Hurt|Nick Searcy|Dan Callahan|Gus Buktenica|Marcia Gay Harden|Bobby Hosea|Lee von Ernst|Kerry Washington|Carla Jimenez|Gillian Pernoll|Elizabeth Pernoll|Brittany Murphy|Daniel Leavitt|Lea Nicole Carranza|Amy Benedict|Josh Brolin|Stephanie Mace|Paige Pelletier|Madison Pelletier|Dennis Keiffer
title: The dead girl
